price: কেতিয়াও নহয়। যেতিয়া পৃথিৱীখনক চূৰ্ণ-বিচূৰ্ণ কৰা হ’ব,
arabic: كَلَّآۖ إِذَا دُكَّتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ دَكّٗا دَكّٗا

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: kallā idhā dukkati al-arḍu dakkan dakkan
